tags: yeah thor is having none of this shit tonight
thor: let's be real you look like you wanna suck his dick just admit it
summary: "I haven't slept in four days" winteriron
question: "I haven't slept in four days" winteriron
answer:
Bucky is used to many things in life. Monster squids. Natasha stealing his good coffee. New music being added to his Spotify playlists because Sam’s a bitch who also has really good taste in music and access to Bucky’s phone. 

And, apparently, Tony Stark coming into the common room, flopping down on a couch regardless of a person residing there or not, and falling asleep. And maybe Bucky has been on the couch the last couple–all–times that Tony’s been sleepy and not following a healthy pattern, and so what if he’s really cute and one time he smiled sleepily? 

It doesn’t matter. 

“I haven’t slept in four days,” Tony announces. The Avengers are in the kitchen, because Clint is trying to show them a knife trick that Sharon taught him, and Nat is going to do it correctly later on. Frankly, it looks cool. Bucky and Nat have a bet going to see how many cool knife tricks they can incorporate into battles. Bucky is currently the winner at thirteen. 

The billionaire wobbles slightly, body swaying. 

“Shit,” Bucky mutters, rushing over to his side and grabbing his waist just before he went crashing. “You’re a dumbass with a high IQ,” Bucky mutters. Natasha grins at Bucky. 

“Didn’t think that was your type anymore, Jamie.” 

“If you call me Jamie again, I’m suing the entire nation of Russia for birthing you,” Bucky says. “He’s just tired, and I didn’t want our resident genius to have a concussion.” 

“And ruin that pretty face you want to kiss so much,” Thor teases. Bucky shoots him a look. “We notice things, Barnes. You are not that good at hiding emotions anymore.” 

“Never thought I’d hate that,” he mutters. “I’m going to put Tony on  the couch.” 

And maybe he joins Tony. 

And maybe he realizes he’s in over his head. 

Crap.

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: save a bronco, ride a buckaroo
title: save a bronco, ride a buckaroo
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2BYRgET

by roseandthorns28

Tony Stark is not an asshole. He just plays one for the TVs.

So, the fact that he doesn’t address the recovering Winter Soldier, Cap’s best bud by name for months after he moves into the Tower is not a testament to his arrogance but rather something borne out of an understanding that identity is a fickle bitch and that names are more than just an identifying marker.

Words: 2264, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes, The Avengers - Character
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark

blog.name: lovelyirony
blog.title: sharon's a good character y'all are just mean
blog.description: icon by starkxs. name is jess, please send in a full prompt! thanks so much for stopping by, I appreciate it!

summary: Oh man. How about #56: “Are you flirting with me” for Ironhusbands?? There’s never enough cute content for Tony and Rhodey ❤️
question: Oh man. How about #56: “Are you flirting with me” for Ironhusbands?? There’s never enough cute content for Tony and Rhodey ❤️
answer:
Rhodey sits down next to Tony at the bar, grinning. “Hey cute stuff,” he says, signalling the barman. “Can I get two margaritas?” Tony snorts, turning to Rhodey. 

“You flirting with me?” He asks. “If you are, we might have to have a chaperone, society and all.” Rhodey laughs, taking Tony’s hand. 

“Nice to see you, sweetheart. Sorry I was gone for so long.” 

“Army’s a bitch, what are you gonna do?” Tony questions, pressing a kiss to Rhodey’s hand. “Now, after we get the margaritas that you ordered, Bruce got bold and challenged Clint to a darts match. I think he might have a winning shot.” 

“He knows people actually do call Clint ‘Hawkeye,’ right? Because he does have good aim?” 

“When you’re as petty as Bruce is, I think that you can get anything done,” Tony remarks. “Come on, sugarplum. I think Nat saved us seats.” 

And as Rhodey follows Tony, he feels so incredibly lucky that he got to marry this man. 

(So maybe he doesn’t know that Tony is thinking the same thing as he sips his margarita, but that’s okay. They both know that they love each other.)

blog.name: lovelyirony
blog.title: sharon's a good character y'all are just mean
blog.description: icon by starkxs. name is jess, please send in a full prompt! thanks so much for stopping by, I appreciate it!

summary: 6 tonypepperrhodey
question: 6 tonypepperrhodey
answer:
“I lost the baby.” 

It’s Rhodey who says this, Rhodey who went on the mission. There was one casualty. Pepper and Tony sat silently with Rhodey, hands on each arm. He didn’t need reassurance. Didn’t need soft words of love. He just needed someone there. 

They don’t say anything. Just cry, hold each other, and try to go to bed and fail. But Rhodey breathes, Pepper cries, and Tony makes a silent text to the therapist for an appointment as soon as possible. 

Things will be okay.

reblog.comment:

They don’t say anything. Just cry, hold each other, and try to go to bed and fail. But Rhodey breathes, Pepper cries, and Tony makes a silent text to the therapist for an appointment as soon as possible.

“I lost the baby.” 

It’s Rhodey who says this, Rhodey who went on the mission. There was one casualty. Pepper and Tony sat silently with Rhodey, hands on each arm. He didn’t need reassurance. Didn’t need soft words of love. He just needed someone there. 

They don’t say anything. Just cry, hold each other, and try to go to bed and fail. But Rhodey breathes, Pepper cries, and Tony makes a silent text to the therapist for an appointment as soon as possible. 

Things will be okay.

summary:
Tony, trying to be relatable: That moment when you go into a room and forget why you went in there!
The Winter Soldier: [stabs...
body:
Tony, trying to be relatable: That moment when you go into a room and forget why you went in there!

The Winter Soldier: [stabs Tony]

Tony: Oh, that’s right, I was getting chased by a serial killer!

blog.name: myshittyironmansideblog
blog.title: a recovering alcoholic reads iron man comics
blog.description:
instead of yelling at my poor boyfriend im going to yell into the void 
| 26 years old | trans guy | ben |
i only use the mobile app so im sorry if everything is a mess. 
my main blog is @icouldreallyuseanewurl

tags: full on crying at this point
also i can say with experience
mixing alcohol and nerve problems is a very bad idea!
summary:
Oh thank christ. He put it back without drinking any.
For the record, don't do stuff like this to yourself. Don't save the last...
body:
Oh thank christ. He put it back without drinking any.

For the record, don’t do stuff like this to yourself. Don’t save the last bottle to prove you’re strong enough. Getting rid of it proves that. Keeping is just an unnecessary stress.

Iron Man: The End

reblog.comment:
Oh thank christ. He put it back without drinking any.
